DEMO_600_MSG_010:
̂What a dreadful place... I can't believe just how
much dark matter has spread inside this place.
ā
DEMO_600_MSG_020:
̂We must hurry, ȁ... by the looks of the
contamination levels here, we'll have little time.
DEMO_600_MSG_030: ̂Don't forget... we're headed towards the innermost area of the Core. That's where we'll find Mother...
DEMO_600_MSG_040: ̂Once there, I'm planning on using this antibody to eradicate the dark matter that has contaminated Mother.
DEMO_600_MSG_050:
̂I think it goes without saying, however... there's no way
that I could pull this off by myself.
ā
DEMO_600_MSG_060:
̂That's exactly where you come in, ȁ!
I need you to clear the way to Mother's chamber.
ā
DEMO_600_MSG_070:
̂Dark Master also said he'd be waiting in here for us...
Please be as careful as you can, ȁ.
